articles.title: India can learn from Europe’s dementia villages given rise in Alzheimer’s cases: Dr Sandeep Jauhar - Indiatimes.com
articles.description: Sunday Times News: Dr Sandeep Jauhar is a US-based cardiologist and author of three bestselling books, of which ‘Heart: A History’ was a finalist for the 2019 Wellcome B.
